attributes.action: To change the education system so that it is not just regurgitating information
attributes.additional_details:
Why do we teach all kids the same thing if a doctor prescribed the same thing to everyone it would cause chaos. Some evidence of this is  
Frederick J. Kelly, the man who invented standardized testing, who said, and I quote: "These tests are too crude to be used and should be abandoned.”

Nonacademic Effects of Homework in Privileged, High-Performing High Schools 

There are many other sources you can check on verified news outlets or study’s.
attributes.background: kids don’t reach there full creativity and potential because of our school system. They should put the focus on learning not testing. we get force fed information and then throw it back out into a test. That’s not education that’s bulimia. Kids have different dreams but we teach them the same way.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like changes to the education system, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
